entry.title: Hexo Google Analytics
entry.content: Add Google AnalyticsApply Google Analytics ID starting from “UAxxx”.Configure _config.yml. 123google_analytics: tracking_id: ${your-google-anlytics-id} localhost_ignored: false Need to set localhost_ignored either true or false by uncomment. Otherwise, it won’t work. Looks like there’s no default value which will case js error not sending stats out.

entry.title: Hexo add search
entry.content: Use local search with NexT theme to enable search on blog. Installation1$ npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save Hexo ConfigAdd in _config.yml 12345search: path: search.xml field: post format: html limit: 10000 NexT ConfigIn _config.xml of NexT theme, enable local search. 1234567891011# Local search# Dependencies: https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-generator-searchdblocal_search: enable: true # if auto, trigger search by changing input # if manual, trigger search by pressing enter key or search button trigger: auto # show top n results per article, show all results by setting to -1 top_n_per_article: 1 # unescape html strings to the readable one unescape: false Access searchAfter “hexo g” and “hexo d”, search button will be added in homepage.

entry.title: Hexo Blog Set Up
entry.content: Set up blog with Hexo, Next theme, github. Blog set upInstall Hexo1npm install -g hexo-cli Create blog dir123hexo init blogcd blognpm install After installation, _config.yml is important under dir. Basic setting of website, e.g., title, description, keywords, etc.Finish config change, in blog dir, exec 1hexo s local mode has been started. Can be accessed through http://localhost:4000 Integete with githubgithub provided github.io to enable website build. Create a public repo with your ${github_account}.github.io. addon for hexoInstall hexo-deployer-git. 1npm install hexo-deployer-git --save Configure your github repo in _config.yml 1234deploy: type: git repo: https://github.com/Russell-W-Huang/russell-w-huang.github.io.git branch: master deploy blog to github repoexec 12hexo ghexo d Access your new websiteBe exited to see website through https://${github_account}.github.io

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
